pages.title: Tiger
pages.text: The tiger ($(o)Panthera tigris$()) is the largest living cat species and a member of the genus Panthera.$(br2)It is most recognisable for its dark vertical stripes on orange fur with a white underside.$(br2)An apex predator, it primarily preys on ungulates, such as deer and wild boar.

pages.title: Tiger
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:porkchop$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
